title: What happened on Earth 1000 years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: The usual sh*t. War. Assassination. Plunder. Treachery. And the rest of the finery. This is year 2018. 1018 happened exactly 1000 years ago.  In India, the Ancient Age ended and Middle Age started as Sultan Mahmud of Ghazni ended his domestic problems and started marching towards Kanauj, the centre of Indian glory. On the way he attacked and plundered Mathura and killed king Chandrapala that very year. What followed was long dominance of Turco-Persian rule in India, until the British won their first battle in 1757. Indians were doing fine on their own, as Chalukya king Durlabha attacked and plundered Lata.  The Holy Roman emperor Henry II sent an army towards West-Frisia (Holland) to subdue the rebellious Count Dirk III, who was not very nice to local bishops. The army met with disastrous consequences in the Battle of Vlaardingen.  Byzantine general Eustathios Daphnomeles invited Ibatzes, the leader of the Bulgarian resistance, to an man-o-man discussion. The general and his associates sprang on Ibatzes at the meeting, took out his eyes, packed him up, and abducted him by forcefully removing him from the premise. Emperor Basil II annexed Bulgaria that very year after this poor end of a 50-year long bitter struggle of the Bulgarians against the Byzantines.  In Cordoba Caliph Abd ar-Rahman IV had an even more interesting year as he went into battle against Cadiz. When he was fleeing the battle he was taken down and killed by the very people who put him on the throne that very year.  King Canute was having a more polite time up north, as he placed four English bishops in Ribe (Jutland), Odense (Funen), Roskilde (Zealand) and Lund (Sweden). His neighbour, king Malcom II of Scotland was not so modern in his ways of subjugation as he devastated Northumbrians at the Battle of Carham.  In the other end of the Eurasian continent, the Chinese Khitan kingdom launched an army of 100,000 soldiers against Goryeo kingdom of Korea. Goreyos answered with 208,000 soldiers. General Gang of the Goreyo used a river dam as his weapon of mass destruction. When he broke the dam the entire Khitan army drowned, leaving some 10,000 to go back home.  CNN would have been as big a hit 1000 years back. BONUS: The Comet in the Year 1018

author_info.name: Thomas de La Marnierre (トマ・サレ)

response.answer_text: We’re in 1018 AD (Julian calendar, since the Gregorian calendar does not exist). Europe  The Holy Roman Empire makes peace with the Duchy of Poland.The King of Burgundy swears fealty to the Holy Roman Emperor, but it causes an uprising in Provence.In Toulouse (Kingdom of France), the tradition to beat a Jew for the Holy Week ends up in a dramatic way since this time the Jew had his skull broken with the brains leaking.The Duke of Lower Lotharingia is defeated by the Duke of Holland.The Duke of Poland gets involved in the Kievan Rus Succession Crisis.The Kingdom of Scotland defeats the Northumbrians of England and annexes Lothian. The royal prince Duncan of Scotland is invested King of Strathclyde after the death of the last Breton king.The Eastern Roman Empire conquers the first Bulgarian EmpireThe Normans are defeated by the Eastern Roman Empire (ERE) in Cannae (Apulia, Italy, to the ERE), and those latter crush a revolt in Italy again.The Countess of Barcelona (Catalonia) calls for a crusade against the muslims and gets the help of the Norman lord Roger the First.The 6th and 7th Califs of Cordoba are assassinated.The Fatimid Caliphate still occupies Sicily and Sardinia.Asia  The Ghaznavid Persian Empire prepares a 12th expedition in India. The Gurjara-Pratihara Empire is defeated, and many tributary states reclaim their independence. Sack of Kannauj. Some of those captives would end up as far as the Balkans (Eastern Roman Empire).The Khitans try to invade the Kingdom of Goryeo (in Korea) for the third time, but fail.America  The Mayan Chichen Itza Empire is in decline. There won’t be a dominant power in Yucatán until the 12th century.Africa  The Fatimid Caliph al-Hakim wants to impose his Ismaelian beliefs to the Sunni and persecutes Christians and Jews, that were perceived as too rich and powerful. Sunni sources hate him and accuse him of every cruelty and excentricity.The Ghana Empire, roughly in that time period, forced the Berbers of Awdaghost to accept their rule.
